bgimages.name: @tanker:audience:title
bgimages.desc: Audience data fuels business growth – know more about your customers to better address their needs. Learn your users’ location, their engagement and loyalty levels, and the technology they use. Enrich reports with your own offline customer data.

bgimages.name: Custom user data
bgimages.desc: You can add up to 1 000 custom dimensions per user to track important online interactions not captured by default or to supplement website statistics with offline CRM data. Create narrow segments to examine of all kinds of audience groups: for instance, explore behavior patterns of top-spending clients who’ve last been to your site three months ago.

bgimages.name: Engagement
bgimages.desc: Know if your audience is interested by keeping track of the average number of pages per user and time spent on site. Monitor traffic distribution by time of day to learn when your users are at their most active.

descimages.name: Geography
descimages.desc: Data on your user’s location can provide you with valuable market insights. Click-throughs from users in regions other than your target locations can hint on where you can focus your marketing efforts to drive growth.

descimages.name: Loyalty
descimages.desc:
It’s always good to know how many first-time visitors turn into your loyal customers. Loyalty 
report shows recency and frequency of visits, as well as the total number of visits per user – so that you can find out the average number of sessions it usually takes for a lead to convert.

descimages.name: Technology
descimages.desc:
The way your users access your site can greatly impact the interaction outcome – often it’s 
the broken layout that’s making people leave, not the message. Having your users’ OS, browser version, device and screen resolution will help you make sure your site is fully functional – and redesign with all types of users in mind.

descimages.name: Ad blockers usage
descimages.desc: For content sites, it’s crucial to monitor ad blocking software usage. Ad blockers report shows the percentage of sessions where ads were filtered out by some of the most common apps such as Adblock, Adblock Plus, Adguard, uBlock, and others.

call-to-action.title: Ready in no time
call-to-action.desc: To enable behavioral analytics, you’ll only need to update your YM counter code with a few lines of JavaScript – those can be fetched by enabling the “Webvisor” option in your account settings.

cols.title: Powerful segmentation  that just works
cols.desc: Analyze audience segments as narrow as you wish – by gender, age, traffic source, or even device type or browser version and more. Compare users who’ve converted with the ones who didn’t: spot trends and work out the interface

cols.title: Track and analyze  what’s most important
cols.desc: Tag almost any event and assess the impact of various user behavior aspects like adding a comment or clicking a ‘’complain” button. Analyze groups of users based on CRM data – for example, compare “top spenders” with “hot leads”.

bgimages.name: Behavioral analytics
bgimages.desc: Put together the pieces of the UX picture and improve site design: analyze metrics together with user behavior and intent. Session replay, form analytics, click&scroll heatmaps: the in-page analytics power pack available right out of the box.

descimages.name: Accurate session replay
descimages.subname: Track down all roadblocks to conversion
descimages.desc:
Find the ‘’why’’ behind every conversion lost by seeing how people interact with your site, like in a video footage. Clicks, scrolls, type-ins, mouse movements – all in a single telltale movie. 

– a sample to choose from: more than 100K recorded sessions per day
– recordings of personalized pages
– desktop & mobile versions

descimages.name: Form analytics
descimages.subname: Find that “odd one out” field that’s hurting your conversions
descimages.desc: Detect the pain points causing people to abandon checkout forms. Analyze how users move down the ‘‘form funnel’’ field-by-field and reveal what’s making them give up. Discover why a form isn’t performing well and how to fix it.

descimages.name: Click heatmaps
descimages.subname: Iterate faster with data-driven design decisions
descimages.desc: Find the focal points of your site by seeing what your visitors are clicking on – even if they tried to click a blank spot they mistook for a link. Use different heatmap visualizations to get more insights. Examine pages one by one or in groups, if they have similar structure.

descimages.name: Scroll heatmaps
descimages.subname: Make sure your most important button is seen
descimages.desc: Take the guesswork out of those just-how-long-this-landing-page-should-be decisions. Pinpoint the exact spot where most of your visitors give up scrolling – and find the optimal place for a call-to-action button or an important message.

smallfeatures.name: Totally customizable reports
smallfeatures.desc: Report can be tweaked or completely restructured – no need to switch back and forth between predefined and ad hoc sections of the interface. Choose any dimensions/metrics, create and compare segments and save as many custom report templates use as you wish. Up to 7 dimensions per report.

features.name: Traffic
features.desc: Detailed traffic data for desktop and mobile, updated in near real time. Learn which channels bring you qualified visitors – whether its PPC/SEM, organic search, direct, referral or social media traffic. Use different attribution models to see which source performs better. Get traffic quality score with a sophisticated bot filter.

smallfeatures.name: Totally customizable reports
smallfeatures.desc: y report can be tweaked or completely restructured – no need to switch back and forth between predefined and ad hoc sections of the interface. Choose any dimensions/metrics, create and compare segments and save as many custom report templates use as you wish. Up to 7 dimensions per report.

features.name: Traffic
features.desc: Detailed traffic data for desktop and mobile, updated in near real time. Learn which channels bring you qualified visitors – whether its PPC/SEM, organic search, direct, referral or social media traffic. Use different attribution models to see which source performs better. Get traffic quality score with a sophisticated bot filter.

features.name: Audience
features.desc: Get to know your users better – discover their age, gender, location, device/browser and even ad blocking apps usage. Understand audience loyalty and analyze behavior trends and patterns with user-centric segments. Add up to 1 000 user- or session-scope custom dimensions to enhance user profile. Privacy protected.

features.name: Behavior
features.desc: Go deeper than pageviews or sessions. Discover how different user groups engage with your site – and get to know why they do what they do by seeing the intent behind the clicks. Session replay, click&scroll heatmaps, form analytics – powerful toolset with easy-breezy segmentation available right out of the box.

bgimages.desc: Measure site performance in terms of business success. Track all meaningful interactions like purchases, submitting forms, downloads, and even shares and likes. Connect e-commerce data stream to get a wealth of information on each offer’s effectiveness.

bgimages.name: Goals to suite your business
bgimages.desc: A goal is any action that is useful to your business. For e-commerce sites, goals can be purchases, for content sites – the number of pages viewed during single session, and so on. You can configure up to 100 goals per site.

descimages.name: Custom events tracking
descimages.desc: Any meaningful interaction with your site can be tracked and analyzed. If the data you need is not captured by default, you can build custom events: these can be clicking a specific button, scrolling to a certain point on a page or any other JavaScript event.

descimages.name: Funnels to explore conversion paths
descimages.desc: Create your own funnels, or multi-step goals, by choosing the actions that a visitor has to complete on their way to purchase. By comparing intermediate conversion rates for each step and spotting where visitors drop off, you can identify and eliminate conversion bottlenecks.

descimages.name: Detailed e-commerce reporting
descimages.desc: Analyze sales data in various dimensions – find out which product category, brand or model performs best. Discover the most profitable regions, audiences, or traffic sources. If you already have e-commerce tracking set up in Google Analytics, you can add this data to Yandex.Metrica in one click.

bgimages.name: Ad hoc reporting and powerful segmentation
bgimages.desc: Almost any report in YM can be completely customized. You can select any dimensions and metrics, add multiple goals to the same report, switch attribution models, create ad hoc segments – and save as many bespoke reports as you need.

bgimages.name: Consolidated statistics for several sites
bgimages.desc: If you have several sites on which you need to keep an eye on – say, regional branches – joint statistics for all of them may come in handy. Simply tag the sites you want to monitor simultaneously to see combined stats in a separate report.

descimages.name: Full customization
descimages.desc: Every business is different, and we don’t believe in one-size-fits-all reporting. In YM, you have many ready-made reports available right away – like reports on traffic sources or audience location – but they are just templates which you can easily modify to get the answers to the questions that are uniquely yours.

descimages.name: Powerful segmentation
descimages.desc: Insights are never found in totals: you’ll always have to explore your audience by breaking it into meaningful groups. To make your own segments, you can use as many filters as you need; include or exclude criteria; apply different timeframes for each filter and for the whole report.

descimages.name: Complete session history of a user
descimages.desc: When creating a segment, you can work with both user-scope and session-scope criteria to select narrow sets of visits. For example, pick out visits with conversions, but only from users who’ve landed on your site from a particular promotional campaign.

descimages.name: Statistical accuracy on demand
descimages.desc: Some numbers are more reliable than others. When exploring averages and relative values, you can opt for only displaying the data calculated for a statistically correct sample size – and avoid making skewed decisions.

descimages.name: User-controlled sampling
descimages.desc:
We capture all visits and events your site sends. 
When fetching a report, the system automatically adjusts sampling rate to get you the data you need faster. But you can always change the sampling setting and even opt for the maximum accuracy and choose 100% of visits to go into report – regardless of the data amount.

call-to-action.title: Attribution – right where you need it
call-to-action.desc: Instantly determine the input of each marketing channel. Apply one of the built-in attribution models in any report where you use traffic source as a dimension. For example, find out the first traffic source for visits with conversions.

bgimages.name: Traffic
bgimages.desc: Discover which sources are driving qualified visits. Get a fuller picture of each channel’s performance using built-in attribution models. Benefit from noise-free reports without referral spam and see the bot score of any source.

bgimages.name: Built-in spam filters
bgimages.desc: Referral spam distracts and creates noise in site statistics. In YM, you don’t have to clean it up manually: we protect your site from fake visits using built-in filters that block most spam traffic sources.

descimages.name: Segmentation and drill-down options
descimages.desc:
Analyze traffic by campaign, banner creative or keyword – as well as by users’ location, 
device or browser version. Compare sources by user interests or retention. Zoom in on a source, pick it out as a segment and use it in any other report to get insights on its performance.

descimages.name: Sources automarkup
descimages.desc: All types of traffic sources are recognized automatically – so that you can see the top traffic drivers right away. You’ll find all established online marketing channels marked up as ad, search, referral, e-mail, social and direct traffic.

descimages.name: Bot score
descimages.desc: Find out which sources are sending you bots: simply opt for bot score displayed as a metric. Or exclude all bot traffic so that it will only appear in a separate report. We use sophisticated bot detection system which combines bot lists and machine learning algorithms, so that as much bot traffic as possible is weeded out.

ru.title: Yandex.Metrica is one of the top-3 leading web analytics solutions in the world*
ru.sub: Powered by Yandex – the leading search provider in Russia and CIS

ru.title: Traffic
ru.desc: Easy to use attribution models. Traffic quality score and advanced bot filters.

ru.title: Audience
ru.desc: Extensive user data including nifty details such as ad blocking apps usage.

ru.title: Performance
ru.desc: Up to 100 goals per site. E-com tracking with detailed offer stats. Custom user data upload.

ru.title: Behavior
ru.desc: Session replay, click and scroll heat maps, form analysis – out of the box.

ru.title: Technology
ru.desc: Point-and-click installation. No limits on data volume or storage time.

ru.title: Powerful API
ru.desc: Near real-time updates. No data truncation: sampling is user-controlled.

list.name: Session replay
list.desc: Watch how people use your site: all their clicks, scrolls, mouse movements and type-ins recorded in a video. Learn what baffles them on their way to purchase and get insights about the bits of the interface that need work to improve user experience.

list.name: Click Heatmaps  & Form Analytics
list.desc: Find out which parts of a page drive the most attention – and where your blinds spots are. Identify where exactly users give up scrolling. See how people fill in forms and discover the success rate of each field. Compare behavior of different audiences.

list.name: Intuitive Dashboard
list.desc: A set of interactive widgets with the metrics you want readily available. Any widget is like a tiny report where you can choose the date range, visualization type or audience segment. To create your own dashboard, simply pick, tweak and drag’n’drop the widgets you need.

list.name: Reports – tailored to the task at hand
list.desc: Any predefined report can be completely reorganized in a few clicks so that you can instantly get the answer you’re looking for. Add or delete any dimensions and metrics, change attribution model and compare audience segments – all on the same page.

list.name: All of your data, forever
list.desc: We let you handle your data the way you need. You can flexibly adjust sampling in any report – choose the percentage of visits to be included, or completely disable sampling by opting for 100%. And we’ll keep all of your data forever, no matter the volume.

ru.title: Solutions by industry
ru.desc: Detailed traffic data for desktop and mobile, updated in near real time.
